org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.igfs

Class IgfsMetricsAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.igfs.IgfsMetricsAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable, IgfsMetrics

    public class IgfsMetricsAdapter
extends Object
implements IgfsMetrics, Externalizable
    IGFS metrics adapter.

      • IgfsMetricsAdapter

        public IgfsMetricsAdapter()
        Externalizable support.

      • IgfsMetricsAdapter

        public IgfsMetricsAdapter(long locSpaceSize,
                          long maxSpaceSize,
                          long secondarySpaceSize,
                          int dirsCnt,
                          int filesCnt,
                          int filesOpenedForRead,
                          int filesOpenedForWrite,
                          long blocksReadTotal,
                          long blocksReadRmt,
                          long blocksWrittenTotal,
                          long blocksWrittenRmt,
                          long bytesRead,
                          long bytesReadTime,
                          long bytesWritten,
                          long bytesWriteTime)
        Parameters:
        locSpaceSize - Used space on local node.
        maxSpaceSize - Maximum space size.
        secondarySpaceSize - Secondary space size.
        dirsCnt - Number of directories.
        filesCnt - Number of files.
        filesOpenedForRead - Number of files opened for read.
        filesOpenedForWrite - Number of files opened for write.
        blocksReadTotal - Total blocks read.
        blocksReadRmt - Total blocks read remotely.
        blocksWrittenTotal - Total blocks written.
        blocksWrittenRmt - Total blocks written remotely.
        bytesRead - Total bytes read.
        bytesReadTime - Total bytes read time.
        bytesWritten - Total bytes written.
        bytesWriteTime - Total bytes write time.

    • Method Detail

      • localSpaceSize

        public long localSpaceSize()
        Gets local used space in bytes. This is the sum of all file chunks stored on local node.

        This is a local metric.

        Specified by:
        localSpaceSize in interface IgfsMetrics
        Returns:
        Node used space in bytes.

      • maxSpaceSize

        public long maxSpaceSize()
        Gets maximum amount of data that can be stored on local node. This metrics is related to to the DataRegionConfiguration.getMaxSize() of the IGFS data cache.
        Specified by:
        maxSpaceSize in interface IgfsMetrics
        Returns:
        Maximum IGFS local space size.

      • secondarySpaceSize

        public long secondarySpaceSize()
        Get used space in bytes used in the secondary file system.

        This is a global metric.

        Specified by:
        secondarySpaceSize in interface IgfsMetrics
        Returns:
        Used space in the secondary file system or 0 in case no secondary file system is configured.

      • directoriesCount

        public int directoriesCount()
        Gets number of directories created in file system.

        This is a global metric.

        Specified by:
        directoriesCount in interface IgfsMetrics
        Returns:
        Number of directories.
